text: In fact I use the interface enough (the "zen" mode to edit all entries in a page). The batch mode is just uploading a file from "files" menu you can merge with existing translations (there are some merging options such as upload as suggestion, edit needed and no replace) . The script generates such a file. Benefits are that you can translate offline and use translations tools other than those of weblate as a reference.
